title: Did Bad Bunny's 'ICE out' Grammy message tease his Super Bowl halftime show? The NFL will find out when we do.

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Did Bad Bunny's 'ICE out' Grammy message tease his Super Bowl halftime show? The NFL will find out when we do.
sources.description: For a league that levitates between being buttoned up at times — but loose and edgy in others — the Super Bowl halftime has become a pursuit of trying to have it all.
